'''Gildor''' (died {{FA|460}}<ref>{{GA|167}}</ref>) was a one of [[Barahir]]'s [[Barahir's outlaws|twelve outlaws]].

==History==
Gildor fought in the [[Dagor Bragollach]] under the command of [[Barahir]]. He was part of a small group of men loyal to their lord that survived.<ref>{{S|Fingolfin}}</ref> The survivors formed a small band and lived as outlaws in [[Dorthonion]], near [[Tarn Aeluin]]. 

They lived in hiding for some time, until [[Morgoth]]'s agents captured [[Gorlim]] and coerced him into giving the location of their hideaway. [[Orcs]] were sent to raid it, and succeeded. Gildor and the other outlaws were killed. Only [[Beren]] survived, as he had been away on an errand.<ref>{{S|Beren}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The meaning of ''Gildor'' is not given, but it can be deduced that it is [[Sindarin]] "Star Lord", from [[gil]] ("star") + -dor ("lord, king").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-879448255.html|articlename=S. ''Gildor'' m.|dated=|website=Eldamo|accessed=15 December 2019}}</ref>
